verses.verse: (For the choir director; on stringed instruments. A Psalm of Asaph, a Song.) God <WH430> is known <WH3045> in Judah; <WH3063> His name <WH8034> is great <WH1419> in Israel. <WH3478>
And His tabernacle <WH5520> is in Salem; <WH8004> His dwelling <WH4585> place <WH4585> also is in Zion. <WH6726>
There <WH8033> He broke <WH7665> the flaming <WH7565> arrows, <WH7198> The shield, <WH4043> and the sword, <WH2719> and the weapons <WH4421> of war. <WH4421> Selah. <WH5542>
Thou art resplendent, <WH215> More <WH4480> majestic <WH117> than <WH4480> the mountains <WH2022> of prey. <WH2964>
The stouthearted <WH47> <WH3820> were plundered; <WH7997> They sank <WH5123> into sleep; <WH8142> And none <WH3808> <WH3605> of the warriors <WH2428> <WH376> could use <WH4672> his hands. <WH3027>
At Thy rebuke, <WH1606> O God <WH430> of Jacob, <WH3290> Both rider <WH7393> and horse <WH5483> were cast <WH7290> into a dead <WH7290> sleep. <WH7290>
Thou, even Thou, art to be feared; <WH3372> And who <WH4310> may stand <WH5975> in Thy presence <WH6440> when <WH4480> once <WH9241> Thou art angry <WH639>?
Thou didst cause judgment <WH1779> to be heard <WH8085> from heaven; <WH8064> The earth <WH776> feared, <WH3372> and was still, <WH8252>
When God <WH430> arose <WH6965> to judgment, <WH4941> To save <WH3467> all <WH3605> the humble <WH6035> of the earth. <WH776> Selah. <WH5542>
For the wrath <WH2534> of man <WH120> shall praise <WH3034> Thee; With a remnant <WH7611> of wrath <WH2534> Thou shalt gird <WH2296> Thyself.

Make <WH5087> vows <WH5087> to the Lord <WH3068> your God <WH430> and fulfill <WH9608> [them]; Let all <WH3605> who are around <WH5439> Him bring <WH2986> gifts <WH7862> to Him who <WH4172> is to be feared. <WH4172>
He will cut <WH1219> off <WH1219> the spirit <WH7307> of princes; <WH5057> He is feared <WH3372> by the kings <WH4428> of the earth. <WH776>
